lead_paragraph: Support for marijuana measures on the November ballot is nearly 100 percent among candidates for mayor of Oakland, which has staked a good part of its economic future on marijuana.
snippet: Support for marijuana measures on the November ballot is nearly 100 percent among candidates for mayor of Oakland, which has staked a good part of its economic future on marijuana.

headline.main: Candidate in Oakland Bucks Tide on Measure
headline.seo: Candidate in Oakland Bucks Tide on Marijuana Measure
headline.print_headline: Candidate In Oakland Bucks Tide On Measure
